arts.ttl: Kevin Thelwell hinted at Everton future decision as wild celebrations prove Jordan Pickford point
arts.sum: Everton analysis from Goodison Park as Jordan Pickford saves Anthony Gordon's penalty to give the Toffees a point against Newcastle

arts.ttl: Sean Dyche fumes over Everton penalty decision in Newcastle draw
arts.sum: Sean Dyche felt Everton should have been awarded a penalty during their goalless draw with Newcastle United on Saturday. Neither side could break the deadlock at Goodison Park, despite the fact that the visitors were given a spot kick of their own in the first half. Anthony Gordon could not convert as Jordan Pickford dived […] The post Sean Dyche fumes over Everton penalty decision in Newcastle draw first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Newcastle handed major boost as key duo near return from injury
arts.sum: Newcastle United are set to be handed a double boost with the imminent return of strikers Alexander Isak and Callum Wilson from injury. Isak has been sidelined with a broken toe in recent weeks, while Wilson has been recovering from a back injury since the summer, causing him to miss the entire start of the […] The post Newcastle handed major boost as key duo near return from injury first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe: Anthony Gordon ‘handled disappointment well’ after penalty miss
arts.sum: Gordon saw his spot-kick saved by former club-mate Jordan Pickford in a goalless draw.

arts.ttl: Sean Dyche says there's one thing 'he can't work out' about Everton penalty denial
arts.sum: Sean Dyche speaks after Everton's 0-0 draw against Newcastle at Goodison Park

arts.ttl: What Jordan Pickford and Anthony Gordon did at full-time speaks volumes as Everton hero laughs last
arts.sum: Everton drew 0-0 with Newcastle at Goodison Park and Jordan Pickford was the hero with a penalty save from Anthony Gordon

arts.ttl: What Jordan Pickford did at full-time as Newcastle's Anthony Gordon faces Everton tirade
arts.sum: Newcastle United star Anthony Gordon may have missed a crucial penalty kick on his return to Goodison Park - but he did not disappear without a trace. Everton responded four minutes later when Calvert-Lewin was played through the middle by Ashley Young but his shot was easily patted down by Nick Pope .

arts.ttl: Newcastle United penalty taker decision made after Anthony Gordon miss
arts.sum: Howe had no issues with Gordon's response after the miss and expects him to step up and do the job again going forward at some stage. Howe said after the game: "Naturally he will be disappointed but much better performance than last year.

arts.ttl: Everton's £25m man proves point after Frank Lampard snub and Sean Dyche experiment
arts.sum: Everton shut out Newcastle to gain a valuable point at Goodison Park

arts.ttl: Newcastle United player ratings as two players score 8/10 and Gordon responds to penalty miss
arts.sum: But it was a case of what might have been for Newcastle and Anthony Gordon as he missed penalty kick in the first half. Gordon's miss left Everton fans delighted but ultimately proved the turning point in this stalemate.
